name: Double the Lives, Half the Points
name_original: Double the Lives, Half the Points
description:
Pilot a blue ship avoiding the dangerous obstacles, attacking vulnerable enemies, and acquiring resources. Your mission? Clear the sector of all green energy orbs.

Use the SEPARATION ability (Spacebar) to split each vessel - doubling your lives! This action comes at a cost however, as your current point value is halved.

Created for the GDevelop Jam #3
